name: Egg Salad with Chopped Gherkins
author: SUNSETINAZ
summary: This classic egg salad works well in sandwiches, on crackers, in a lettuce cup, or in a tomato half.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped celery, or more to taste
1 tablespoon chopped gherkins, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place eggs in a large saucepan and cover with cold water
Bring to a boil and remove from heat
Cover the saucepan with a lid and let sit until eggs are cooked through, 10 to 12 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water until eggs are cold
Stir chopped eggs, mayonnaise, green onion, celery, gherkins, brown mustard, and dry mustard together in a bowl
Season with salt and black pepper
